thread.title: Gorilla surprises everyone with his mimicking abilities

title: Gorilla surprises everyone with his mimicking abilities
text:
Gorilla surprises everyone with his mimicking abilities 7:48pm IST - 00:21 
Male gorilla Bolingo has learned how to stand on his hands imitating an animal care specialist. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Male gorilla Bolingo has learned how to stand on his hands imitating an animal care specialist. Rough cut (no reporter narration). Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2JNBsq4
